Class turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • turn

  • public class turn
extends java.lang.Object
    This program handles the turns for the game. It keeps track of how many times to reroll. Keeps track of when other classes should display the hand, reroll the hand, sort the hand, score the hand, display the possible scores. CPSC 224, Spring 2020 Homework 3 No sources to cite.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      turn()
      constructor, defaults to die being 6 sides and a value of 1
      turn(int rolls)
      secondary constructor that lets you specify the number of rolls per turn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkScoreCard(scoreCard myScoreCard)
      checks to see if the user wants to see the scorecard.
      int getReRolls()
      gets the value of the dice
      void rollStep(hand myHand)
      takes care of the roll step of the turn, prints out the initial roll, and calls reroll the specified number of times.
      void scoreStep(hand myHand, scoreCard myScoreCard)
      tracks the score step of the game, prints the sorted hand, calls score hand method then displays all of the possible scores

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        gets the value of the dice

      • rollStep

        public void rollStep(hand myHand)
        takes care of the roll step of the turn, prints out the initial roll, and calls reroll the specified number of times.
        Parameters:
        myHand - the current hand for the turn

      • scoreStep

        public void scoreStep(hand myHand,
                      scoreCard myScoreCard)
        tracks the score step of the game, prints the sorted hand, calls score hand method then displays all of the possible scores
        Parameters:
        myHand - the current hand for the turn
        myScoreCard - the current scorecard
